compliance.headline: Secure & Confidential Employee Data
compliance.confidentiality: We understand employee confidentiality. All candidate and employee data is encrypted and private. We never share your data or use it for AI training.

faq.question: Is candidate data secure and private?
faq.answer: Absolutely! SOC 2 certified with GDPR compliance and encrypted storage. All candidate and employee PII is protected. We never share data or use it for AI training.

faq.question: Can it help with resume screening and ATS?
faq.answer: Yes! Upload candidate resumes and get quick summaries of experience, skills, and qualifications. Perfect for initial screening before ATS or interviews.

faq.question: What types of HR documents can you summarize?
faq.answer: All of them: resumes, cover letters, employee handbooks, policy documents, benefits guides, training materials, performance reviews, labor law updates, and more.

faq.question: How does it help with compliance?
faq.answer: Quickly digest labor law changes, EEOC guidance, and compliance updates so you can update policies and handbooks faster. Stay compliant without spending weeks reading.

faq.question: What plan is best for HR teams?
faq.answer: Most small HR teams use the Pro plan ($19/mo). Growing companies should consider the Team plan ($49/mo) for unlimited users and collaboration. Enterprise HR needs custom plans.

faq.question: Can we share policy summaries with employees?
faq.answer: Yes! Export summaries as PDF or Word to include in new hire packets, employee communications, and training materials.
